title: Real Housewives Sex Drama
itunes:title: Real Housewives Sex Drama
description:
Monday 3/6 - Today on the show the phone lines were opened up for our listeners to answer two topic questions one dealing with the Real Housewives of Atlanta Drama between Porsha and Kandi, and the other dealing with Charlamagne's Donkey of the Day, Andrea Hemming who poisoned her husband because she did not want to have sex with him.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
